original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 831: Let’s Have Lunch
original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett and Dan Lynch chat with Peter van Dijk about PowerDNS! Is the problem always DNS? How did PowerDNS start? And just how big can PowerDNS scale? Watch to find out!


https://github.com/PowerDNS/
https://github.com/Habbie
https://github.com/voorkant/
https://7bits.nl/journal/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: PowerDNSの秘密：スケーラビリティとその起源
body: 今週のFLOSS Weeklyでは、PowerDNSについての対談が行われる。
titles: PowerDNSの秘密：スケーラビリティとその起源
DNSの問題点とは？PowerDNSの運営者と対話する
PowerDNSに挑戦！エピソードのハイライト
FLOSS Weeklyポッドキャスト：PowerDNS特集
YouTubeで見る！PowerDNSに関する生放送の魅力
